field.label: Hide Prices
field.comment: If set to No will not show the Hide Prices option on Update/Add contact maintenance form

field.label: Disable Functionality for the Different Types of Customer
Disabled for Guest Customers (Not Logged In)
No. of Shipping Addresses to be displayed
field.comment: Maximum number of shipping addresses displayed during checkout without use of search. Blank = no limit

field.label: Email
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: First Name
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Last Name
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Company
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Address Line
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Telephone / Mobile / Fax
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Instructions
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Zip/Postal Code
field.comment: blank = no limit

field.label: Disable Configurable Address Formatting on Checkout
field.comment: Setting this to Yes can increase performance on sites where customers have lots of addresses

field.label: Hide My Account Menu Options
field.comment: Select to remove from "My Account" navigation links.

field.label: P21 Token Url
field.comment: Address and port the ERP system is listening for incoming token requests

field.label: Site Name
field.comment: Source used in messaging to identify this site

field.label: ERP URL
field.comment: Address and port the ERP system is listening for incoming connections

field.label: Use REST Service
field.comment: If set to Yes, you have to set Site URL value from "ecc.svc/ecc" to "api/v1/Erp.BO.ECCWebServiceSvc/RestRequest".

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: Maximum time for a connection in seconds

field.label: Curl Proxy
field.comment: Proxy required for accessing the ERP system

field.label: Use SOAP
field.comment: Use the SOAP wrapper on messages to this ERP

field.label: Failed Msg Count
field.comment: Number of failed messages received

field.label: Failed Msg Limit
field.comment: Number of failed messages required to force offline mode

field.label: Site Online
field.comment: Is the site currently able to connect to the ERP system.

field.label: Email recipient to notify when site goes offline
field.comment: Email address for updates.

field.label: Checkout Disabled when Site Offline
field.comment: Should the checkout process disabled while the site is offline or comms are disabled

field.label: No Stock Image
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

field.label: Low Stock Image
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

field.label: In Stock Image
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

field.label: Support for Multiple Units of Measure Per Product
UOM SKU separator
field.comment: values used between the sku and the UOM e.g. Product_Case

field.label: Price Type
field.comment: Default price type for grouped products

field.label: Allow Adding Product Lines to Existing Orders
Maximum Order Amounts
field.comment: The maximum additional value allowed on an order after payment is taken

group.label: ERP Product and Category FTP Image Sync

field.label: Schedule Cron task
field.comment: Sync Assigned images from ERP and FTP

field.label: Products Per Run
field.comment: Number of products to update per task run.

field.label: Schedule Cron task
field.comment: Sync Assigned images from ERP and FTP

field.label: Categories Per Run
field.comment: Number of categories to update per task run.

field.label: Days of Logs
field.comment: Number of days that logs are kept for.

field.label: Cleardown Interval for Order Generation Messages
field.comment: Number of days that logs are kept for GOR messages.

field.label: Cleardown Interval for Multiple Stock Query Messages
field.comment: Number of days that logs are kept for MSQ messages.

field.label: Customer Connect Grid Data Cache Lifetime (seconds)
Quick Add to Basket / Wishlist Config
Force Address Types
field.comment: If yes, customers will only be allowed to choose invoice addresses for billing and delivery addresses for shipping

field.label: Restrict to Mapped Countries
field.comment: If yes, customers will only be allowed to choose a country that has a corresponding country mapping value

field.label: ERP Accounts
field.comment: Is branding supported by messages to/from this system for ERP Accounts?

field.label: Brand Select Page
field.comment: Is the Brand Select Page to be Used

field.label: Size of Brand Image
field.comment: Pixel Height and Width

field.label: Frequency of Notification Message
field.comment: How often will 'no default erpaccount' message appear (hours)

field.label: Debug Mode
field.comment: Show loaded iFrame instead of error messages

field.label: Timeout before giving up on server response
field.comment: Time out in milliseconds. Leave blank for default 25000ms (25s)

field.label: Timeout after giving up on configurator response
field.comment: Time out in milliseconds. Leave blank for default 60000ms (60s)

field.label: Menu Title
field.comment: Title will appear on the top menu in the front end

field.label: Max File Name Length
field.comment: This sets the maximum length of attachment file names. If not set, no restriction is applied.

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: Timeout next queue message after second.

field.label: Max log size
field.comment: This is the maximum log file size in bytes that will display before download becomes mandatory

field.label: Override Individual Message Config to log all Requests for all Messages
Number of Decimal Points for the Quantity Value
field.comment: Leave blank for default value (0 - 4)

field.label: Truncated Trailing Zeros
field.comment: Removes Trailing Zeros from Quantity (5.00 -> 5)

field.label: Rounding Method Used on Quantity Value when Altering the Number of Decimal Points
Product Price Precision
field.comment: Also Check Precision settings in Sales > Checkout Options

field.label: ERP Searching Enabled
field.comment: If set to No, searching will be handled by magento

field.label: The HRT message is Used to Check if the ERP System is Available and to let the ERP System Know if the Website Comms are Disabled
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The SYN Message is Used to Request Uploads of Data from the ERP System
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Full Sync
field.comment: Messages selected here will always be regarded as a full sync

field.label: Start Date
field.comment: Times shown here are not adjusted for daylight saving

field.label: Next Run Date
field.comment: Times shown here are not adjusted for daylight saving

field.comment: Times shown here are not adjusted for daylight saving

field.comment: Times shown here are not adjusted for daylight saving

field.comment: Times shown here are not adjusted for daylight saving

field.comment: Times shown here are not adjusted for daylight saving

field.label: The AST Message is Used to Request UpToDate Account Details from the ERP System
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The CNC Message Creates New ERP Customers
Default Template Code For B2B
field.comment: Default template code to send in the CNC message for B2B

field.label: Default Template Code For B2C
field.comment: Default template code to send in the CNC message for B2C

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The CIM Message is Used to Initiate the Configurator with ERP
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The CDM Message is Used to Retrieve Details About the Configured Product
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Generate/Update a Quote for the Specified Items
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Max SKUs in CSV upload on Quick Order Pad
field.comment: Blank or zero will send all skus in 1 msq else enter number of sku in multi msq

field.label: Grouped Product Child Products List on Detail Page
Product List Pages (Category / Search Results / Quick Order Pad Results)
Product Cross-Sells Display on Cart Page
Product Upsell Display on Product Details Page
Display Customer Price as Base Price
field.comment: If set to No you will see base price as the regular price and customer price as the special price

field.label: Attribute Values use CDATA
field.comment: This will wrap <attribute> values in CDATA

field.label: Send MSQ after STK
field.comment: This will send an msq to populate the customer prices within the database

field.label: ERP Account to use with MSQ after STK
field.comment: If no customer is selected an msq for each customer will be sent.

field.label: Send Scheduled MSQ
field.comment: This will send an msq to populate the customer prices for all products within the database

field.label: ERP Account to use with scheduled MSQ
Number of products per scheduled MSQ
field.comment: greater then 75 can cause performance issues on the ERP

field.label: The BSV is Used to Price a Basket Prior to Placing an Order
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Send BSV on Cart Status Change
field.comment: If set to "No", then BSVs will only be sent immediately before the GOR is sent

field.label: Enable Add to Cart BSV Validation
Send BSV on Missing Quote Id
The GOR is Used to Place an Order on the ERP System
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: ERP Order Status for Orders Created While GOR Disabled
field.comment:
Order Not Sent: Orders will be sent to ERP once GOR re-enabled
Never Send: GOR will never be sent for this order

field.label: Generate GOR as background task?
field.comment: If set to Yes, the user will still recieve a succesful response

field.label: Retry Count
field.comment: Blank or Zero means no limit on the number of GOR retry attempt

field.label: Aged Time Limit (seconds)
field.comment: Blank or Zero means no aged time limit is set

field.label: Default Days to Shipping
field.comment: Enter the number of days from order creation that the ERP required date should default to

field.label: Include Tax and Delivery in Total
The DDA is Used to Return Available Delivery Dates from the ERP
No Dates Earlier than BSV Delivery Date
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Limit the total number of available dates shown
field.comment: A value of 0 will show all available dates sent by the erp

field.label: Number of dates generated per round
Show available dates as a list of dates
Dates to Exclude from the returned results
field.comment: Dates in yyyy-mm-dd format. 1 Date per line.

field.label: The CRRD message is used to retrieve customer returns details
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The CRRS Message is Generated During a Customer Returns Search
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Grid Setup
field.comment: Configuration for the grid display

field.label: The CCMS Message is Generated During a Customer Returns Case Management Search

field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The CSNS Message is Generated During a Serial Number Search

field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The CRRU Message is Generated During a Customer Returns Update

field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The FREQ is Used to Request Files from the ERP
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: The FSUB is Used to Submit Files from the ERP
Number of Files Per Scheduled File Submission
Timeout
field.comment: Message specific timeout setting. Leave blank for default

field.label: Uploaded Data Default Filter
field.comment: Messages selected here will be pre-selected in the uploaded data table

field.label: The ALT Message is Sent by the ERP to Upload Alternative and Related products for a Given Product
The CPN Message is Used to upload Customer Specific or Alternative Part Numbers
ERP Code for Global Part Numbers
The CUS Message is Used to Upload Customer Groups from the ERP System
Reject CUS Messages with No Matching Store Branding
Shopper Default Addresses
field.comment: If set to No, then the address selected for a customer as the default address will not be reset to the ERP Account default address

field.label: The CXR Updates Exchange Rates in ECC
The CAD Message is Used to Upload Customer Addresses from the ERP System
The GQR Message is Used to Upload Quotes from the ERP System

group.label: SGP Link Product to Category upload

field.label: The SGP Links Products to Categories
The STG is Used to Upload Product Categories
Skip Null Parent Check
field.comment: If the parent is blank, then only search using the groupCode to find a matching catalog node.

field.label: Set Name And Description To Use Default Value
field.comment: If set to Yes, branding is ignored and category will be enabled for all scopes and every store will use the default value.

field.label: The STK Message is Used to Upload Products
Concatenation Text
field.comment: For eg: Box of 5

field.label: Honor Delete Flag for Renamed SKUs
field.comment: Applies to STKs with a populated newProductCode

field.label: Default Child Visibility
field.comment: Applies to Child Product's of Configurable

field.label: Clear Product Attributes Value
field.comment: When the STK does not contain the attribute then the value will be cleared

field.label: The STT is Used to Upload Product Text for Various Languages
The SOU Updates Orders in ECC
Send Invoice Email to B2B Customer
Send Invoice Email to B2C Customer

Send New Shipment Details Email to B2C Customer
The CREU Updates Returns in ECC
The CRRC Updates Reason Codes in ECC
The LOC Updates Locations in ECC

field.comment: blank = 50 limit

field.comment: Leave blank for no limit

field.label: Order comment to be included in

field.comment: Leave blank for no limit

field.comment: Leave blank for no limit

field.comment: Leave blank for no limit

Allow Cart to be Repriced on Masquerade

field.comment: Message Display On Product Detail Page

field.comment: Message Display On Product Detail Page

field.label: Process/Loader Image
field.comment: Allowed file types: jpeg, gif, png.

field.label: Enable Quantity Validator
field.comment: Setting this to No, means that checkout can proceed even if Minimum Qty, Maximum Qty and Increment Qty conditions are not met.
